item.title: Godsword specials [asteria]
item.dc:creator: @kronixz kronikz
item.description:
@kronixz wrote:

These are really inaccurate but if you want your godswords to work on asteria here is a startâ€¦

combatspecial.java

[code=java] ARMADYL_GODSWORD(new int[] { 11694 }, 50, 1.375, 1, CombatType.MELEE, WeaponInterface.TWO_HANDED_SWORD) {
@Override
public CombatContainer container(Player player, Entity target) {
player.animation(new Animation(7074));
player.highGraphic(new Graphic(1222));

        return new CombatContainer(player, target, 1, CombatType.MELEE,
            true);
    }
},
BANDOS_GODSWORD(new int[] { 11696 }, 100, 1.21, 1, CombatType.MELEE, WeaponInterface.TWO_HANDED_SWORD) {
    @Override
    public CombatContainer container(Player player, Entity target) {
    	player.animation(new Animation(7073));
        player.highGraphic(new Graphic(1223));

        return new CombatContainer(player, target, 1, CombatType.MELEE,
            true);
    }
},
SARADOMIN_GODSWORD(new int[] { 11698 }, 50, 1.1, 1, CombatType.MELEE, WeaponInterface.TWO_HANDED_SWORD) {
    @Override
    public CombatContainer container(Player player, Entity target) {
    	player.animation(new Animation(7071));
        player.highGraphic(new Graphic(1220));

        return new CombatContainer(player, target, 1, CombatType.MELEE,
            true);
    }
},
ZAMORAK_GODSWORD(new int[] { 11700 }, 60, 1.1, 1, CombatType.MELEE, WeaponInterface.TWO_HANDED_SWORD) {
    @Override
    public CombatContainer container(Player player, Entity target) {
    	player.animation(new Animation(7070));
        player.highGraphic(new Graphic(1221));

        return new CombatContainer(player, target, 1, CombatType.MELEE,
            true);
    }
},[/code]

weapon_interfaces + weapon_animations.json

{ "hash": 11694, "item-id": 11694, "interface": "TWO_HANDED_SWORD" }, { "hash": 11696, "item-id": 11696, "interface": "TWO_HANDED_SWORD" }, { "hash": 11698, "item-id": 11698, "interface": "TWO_HANDED_SWORD" }, { "hash": 11700, "item-id": 11700, "interface": "TWO_HANDED_SWORD" }
